title: The Complete Works of F. Scott Fitzgerald.
description: Ebook specifically formatted for kindle devices and tested with all Kindle 5 way navigation functions and Kindle table of contents button. Ebook comes with main table of contents and interlinked sub table of contents. Each chapter is clearly marked so user knows which book within the boxset is being read.  The Novels. • This Side of Paradise. • The Beautiful and Damned. • The Great Gatsby. • Tender is the Night. • The Love of the Last Tycoon.  Short Story Collections. • Flappers And Philosophers. • Tales From The Jazz Age. • All The Sad Young Men. • Taps At Reveille. • The Pat Hobby Stories.  The Complete Short Stories 1909-1940.  The Complete Poems.  The Reviews  Public Letters and Statements.  The Essays and Articles.  The Parody and Humour.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
